statements: SELECT * FROM tax_deadlines;
SELECT tax_entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_deadlines;
SELECT * FROM tax_deadlines WHERE tax_entity_id = 1;
SELECT tax_entity_name FROM tax_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT tax_entity_id, tax_entity_name FROM tax_deadlines ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY tax_entity_name DESC;
SELECT tax_entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2023-01-31';
SELECT tax_entity_name, MAX(filing_deadline) AS latest_filing_deadline FROM tax_deadlines GROUP BY tax_entity_name;
SELECT COUNT(tax_entity_id) AS total_tax_entities, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM filing_deadline) AS year FROM tax_deadlines GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM filing_deadline) ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tax_entity_name FROM tax_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline > '2021-12-31' AND filing_deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities_deadlines;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM tax_entities_contacts WHERE entity_id = 'f45e0723-6689-4a78-ae2e-34fd0ca163d6';
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE entity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities_contacts WHERE contact_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM tax_entities_contacts WHERE entity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline, contact_name, contact_email FROM tax_entities_deadlines JOIN tax_entities_contacts ON tax_entities_deadlines.entity_id = tax_entities_contacts.entity_id WHERE filing_deadline > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities_deadlines;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC;
SELECT office_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM tax_office_contacts WHERE office_id = 1;
SELECT form_name, form_description FROM tax_forms_info WHERE deadline_extension = TRUE;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE tax_entity_id = 1;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_office_contacts WHERE office_name = 'HQ';
SELECT form_name, form_description FROM tax_forms_info WHERE deadline_extension = TRUE;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities_deadlines;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC;
SELECT id, entity_name FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM tax_filings WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT entity_name, message FROM tax_notifications WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities_deadlines ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE entity_name='ABC Corp';
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities_deadlines WHERE filing_deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline, amount FROM tax_entities_deadlines JOIN tax_filings ON tax_entities_deadlines.id = tax_filings.entity_id;
SELECT entity_name, notification_date, message FROM tax_entities_deadlines JOIN tax_notifications ON tax_entities_deadlines.id = tax_notifications.entity_id WHERE notification_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM tax_entities;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities WHERE tax_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM filings WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT filing_id, amount FROM filings ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM penalties WHERE penalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM tax_entities WHERE filing_deadline < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY filing_deadline DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT entity_name, filing_deadline FROM tax_entities WHERE entity_name LIKE 'A%' OR entity_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT filing_id, filing_date, amount FROM filings WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY filing_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reminder_id, r.reminder_date, description, f.filing_date FROM reminders r JOIN filings f ON r.filing_id = f.filing_id WHERE f.status = 'overdue' ORDER BY r.reminder_date ASC;

SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(p.penalty_id) AS total_penalties FROM users u LEFT JOIN filings f ON u.user_id = f.filing_id LEFT JOIN penalties p ON f.filing_id = p.filing_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email ORDER BY total_penalties DESC LIMIT 10;
